title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, October 11, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss writes to his wife, commenting on affairs at home, the morale of the army, a recent battle, and other military news.
keywords: Women, Troop Movement, Family, Military Authority, African Americans, Slavery, Death/Casualties, Battle Description, Patriotism, Prisons/Prisoners, American Civil War
